desc: Botanica ♥️ 100% Hand poured soy wax intention candles, crystals, potion oils, aura sprays, sage, Palo santo and much more to bring out and nurture your inner goddess!

layout.text:
Orders 65.00$ and up get free shipping use discount code "ship222" at checkout
"We are a Metaphysical boutique, we specialize in Crystals, candles and spiritual products. Each and every single candle is 100% hand poured soy wax made with cotton wicks and wooden wicks. We gather various Relics from various belief systems from around the world to assist in spiritual healing."
